alert.note: Alert for Canovanas; Carolina; Loiza; San Juan; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 08 at 10:12PM ADT until July 09 at 12:15AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Canovanas County in Puerto Rico... Carolina County in Puerto Rico... Loiza County in Puerto Rico... San Juan County in Puerto Rico... Trujillo Alto County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1115 PM AST. * At 912 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... San Juan, Trujillo Alto, Carolina, Canovanas, Guaynabo, Santa Barbara, Campo Rico, San Isidro, Lomas and Benitez. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Canovanas; Carolina; Loiza; San Juan; Trujillo Alto
